page.title: 10ATTITUDES
page.content: Most of the people we interviewed live in{Wilford.}Many people have lived here for a long time. Most people said they liked Wilford, but all for different reasons- it is near to the river, it is near to the city atmosphere but has a countryside feeling. Most of the people we spoke to were not born in Wilford. Some people thought that Wilford could be improved by having a doctor and other health services near. Most people thought that the community spirit was most important to people because they chose to live here. There were mixed opinions about whether people liked the shops. Most people did not have a job in Wilford but worked in the area around it. Most people found Wilford a very pleasant place in which to live.
